item.title: API Deployment
item.description: Prerequisites We have seen in the config part that the deployment of our API on DockerHub is automated thanks to a GithubRunner. So we will use the generated docker image to declare new instances of our API. Docker-Compose Here is an example of the API instantiation configuration on Docker-Compose: api_r1: image: alestrio/sdn-cloudstack # Base image name ports: - "8064:8000" # Port exposure (soon deprecated, see proxy..... part) volumes: - /home/user/compose/api/r1/config.
